name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free ChatGPT on new tab - Search or ask

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Searching the Internet or asking a question to artificial intelligence is quick and easy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension updates the search bar in a new tab, allowing you to search the web or ChatGPT for any query.

ChatGPT on new tab is an intelligent and modern extension that really simplifies everyday life. It provides users with a quick and reliable way to get answers to their questions. ChatGPT is powered by advanced AI technology, which allows it to understand the questions and provide accurate and relevant answers. It saves users time and energy, and makes it easy and convenient to access the information they need.

You can also add and remove shortcuts to frequently visited websites in new tab for your convenience.

If you want to work more efficiently, install our extension and use it as your personal assistant! ChatGPT is intuitive and easy to use. It can be used to answer customer inquiries, provide online support, and quickly access information. Plus, it integrates with existing tools, allowing you to use it as a one-stop-shop for all your business needs.

Join the future of AI with us!
